label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_013
content:
## 2024-05-27 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 105
- Active: 100
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 17
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 5

#### By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 24
- Mid Dose: 25
- High Dose: 29
- Placebo: 27

### Immunogenicity By Group

#### Low Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 77.9
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 19.3
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 126.3
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 196.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 131.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 27.9

#### Mid Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 123.6
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 27.4
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 197.1
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 306.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 210.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 52.0

#### High Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 172.1
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 41.1
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 274.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 414.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 285.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 71.1

#### Placebo
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 20.5
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 25.3
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 45.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 22.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 9.5

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 35.6
- Erythema Percentage: 23.6
- Swelling Percentage: 6.5
- Induration Percentage: 9.7
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 16.6

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 11.5
- Fatigue Percentage: 24.5
- Myalgia Percentage: 24.0
- Headache Percentage: 17.8
- Chills Percentage: 8.6

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 5.8
- WBC (K) SD: 1.0
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 34.7
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.3
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 57.5
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.0
- Platelets (K) Mean: 226
- Platelets (K) SD: 41
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 5.1
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 2.0
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.1
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.2

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1328, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1347, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1306, Description: malaise, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1326, Description: fever, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose

### Events
- DSMB safety review teleconference completed
- Immunology core lab QC report received

### Notes
- Week 13: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 105 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
